body.subject: Architecture validation approved - Epic 28 God Agent implementation
body.summary: Architecture implementation validated. Clean Architecture boundaries respected, layer isolation verified, skill adapters correctly call application layer use cases. All components from architecture.json implemented. No layer violations detected. Ready for quality review.
key_points: Layer isolation verified: Domain layer has no imports from outer layers (application, infrastructure, presentation)
Dependency direction correct: Dependencies flow inward (Domain ← Application ← Infrastructure ← Presentation)
Skill adapters compliance: ConciergeSkillAdapter calls PersonalizedReplyUseCase, ResearchSkillAdapter calls CompareRagAnswersUseCase - correctly using application layer

Domain layer purity: All domain entities (TaskPlan, TaskStep, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation, GodAgentProfile) and value objects (Intent, Skill) are pure Python with no external dependencies

Application layer orchestration: Services (MemoryFabricService, IntentRouterService, PlanCompilerService, GodAgentOrchestrator, ConsensusBridge, SafetyViolationDetector) correctly orchestrate use cases
Infrastructure adapters: Skill adapters, repositories, and metrics correctly implement interfaces and call application layer use cases
Consensus Bridge: Implements file-based multi-agent workflow per consensus_architecture.json schema
Interface segregation: All contracts (ISkillAdapter, IMemoryFabricService, IGodAgentMemoryRepository) properly defined and used

architecture_validation.layer_isolation: ✅ Approved - Domain layer isolated, no outer layer imports
architecture_validation.skill_adapter_compliance: ✅ Approved - Skills call application layer use cases, not infrastructure directly
architecture_validation.domain_purity: ✅ Approved - Domain entities and value objects are pure Python
architecture_validation.interface_segregation: ✅ Approved - Interfaces properly defined and used
architecture_validation.reuse_pattern: ✅ Approved - Skills wrap existing use cases without modification

alignment_with_architecture_json.domain_components: ✅ All 8 domain components implemented (Intent, TaskPlan, TaskStep, Skill, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation, GodAgentProfile)
alignment_with_architecture_json.application_services: ✅ All 5 application services implemented (IntentRouterService, PlanCompilerService, GodAgentOrchestrator, ConsensusBridge, MemoryFabricService) + SafetyViolationDetector
alignment_with_architecture_json.infrastructure_adapters: ✅ All 7 infrastructure components implemented (5 skill adapters, GodAgentMemoryRepository, VoicePipelineAdapter, GodAgentMetrics)
alignment_with_architecture_json.contracts: ✅ All contracts from architecture.json implemented (ISkillAdapter, IMemoryFabricService, IGodAgentMemoryRepository)

body.action_needed: Architecture implementation approved. No architectural changes required. Proceed to quality review and deployment. Ensure test coverage ≥ 0.6 for auto-approval.
